key_features.description: Separation of L1 (Polkadot) and L2 (Ethereum) with different use cases
Operates on Polkadot, Kusama, and Ethereum ecosystems
Full Ethereum compatibility on Manta Pacific L2
Fast Finality Protocol for quick transaction confirmation
Optimized transaction costs through L2 scaling
Atlantic and Pacific bridges for asset transfers

security_notes: Code has not been fully security audited (as per GitHub README)
Users advised to use at own risk
Trusted setup required for Groth16 (toxic waste management)
research_notes: Manta Network operates a dual-layer architecture: Manta Atlantic (Polkadot L1) and Manta Pacific (Ethereum L2)
Originally launched on Polkadot in 2020, later expanded to Ethereum with L2 solution
OpenZL represents a significant contribution to ZK infrastructure for Web3
Eclair DSL provides type-safe circuit construction, reducing cryptographic errors
MantaPay enables privacy across entire Polkadot/Kusama parachain ecosystem
Over 200 decentralized applications supported on Manta Pacific
Multi-proof system support (Groth16, PLONK, Nova) provides flexibility
